title: The Takeaways - Sweet and Sour [1984]
description:
This rare Lp is for user "mothandrust". I hope you and other downloaders enjoy it.

The Takeaways were: Deborah Conway, Cathy McQuade, John Clifford, Martin Armiger, Michael Leyton, Graham Bidstrup, Kay Bee, Warren Derwent, Chris Bailey, Ric Herbert, Kim Deacon, Joanna Pigott, Mark Callaghan, Stephen O'Rourke, Mark Edwards, David Reyne, Tommy Emmanuel. 

The Takeaways were a stage band for the ABC Corporations 'Sweet & Sour'. 
Liner notes for the LP "Variously described by the music press as a humble pop group for the 80s, an aggro rock outfit, and a post-tribal dance band. The Takeaways formed in Sydney mid-1983 as a four-piece with a drum machine. The band plays all original songs.  Replaced drum machine with near human being Johnny Black. Recorded independent single 'Sweet & Sour' early 1984. The single received wide alternative airplay. The Takeaways toured Melbourne to promote single and were favourably received by the more discriminating punters. This is the band's first LP.
